name: Doxycycline 100mg
shortDescription: Tetracycline antibiotic for acne, respiratory infections, and Lyme disease.
description: Doxycycline is effective against a wide range of bacteria, protozoa, and spirochetes. Used for acne, respiratory infections, Lyme disease, malaria prophylaxis, and sexually transmitted infections. Inhibits protein synthesis. Take with food to reduce stomach upset, avoid dairy.
metaDescription: Buy Doxycycline 100mg online. Effective for acne, respiratory infections, Lyme disease. Prescription required.

indications.title: Acne & Skin Infections
indications.description: Treats moderate to severe acne and bacterial skin infections.

indications.title: Lyme Disease & Malaria Prophylaxis
indications.description: Prevents Lyme disease progression and malaria infection.

dosageAdministration.instruction: 100mg orally twice daily for 7-14 days. Take with food and water.
2mg/kg per dose orally twice daily. Consult pediatrician.
100mg once or twice daily. Monitor kidney and liver function.

interaction.instruction: Avoid combining with antacids or calcium supplements.
Avoid dairy within 2 hours of dose; take with water.

commonQuestions.question: Can I take on empty stomach?
commonQuestions.answer: Not recommended, may cause nausea. Take with food.

commonQuestions.question: Missed dose?
commonQuestions.answer: Take as soon as remembered. Do not double next dose.

commonQuestions.answer: Yes, at pediatric doses prescribed by doctor.
